allow: Bash(for file in app/about/page.tsx app/capabilities/ecommerce/page.tsx app/capabilities/product/page.tsx app/careers/page.tsx app/case-studies/page.tsx app/contact/page.tsx app/services/page.tsx app/solutions/page.tsx)
Bash(do sed -i "s/from-primary via-primary-dark to-\[#0f4cc4\]/from-primary via-primary-slate to-primary-aqua/g" "$file")
